name: Ennui (Pedatte)
description:
The game

Pipou is bored!

Fortunately the postman brings 'im tons of videogames to play and books to read patiently (and maybe gifts too...)

In this Isometric 3D game, you play as Pipou, the bored dog. Pick up videogames & books, do the right combinaison and gently throw them in your shelves. 

But be careful, Pipou isn't a good loser!

Controls
  • Arrows / ZQSD to move
  • Space to grab an item
Team:

3D Artist - Tom Le Lann @vorunah

2D Artist - Emmanuel Dodet @dodet

Programming - Kevin Pedatte @kpedatte
